text: who's watching you online it's a
question we've all been pondering a
little more seriously since Edward
Snowden blew the lid on various
government activities recently and now
thanks to a plug-in for Firefox you can
see a little more clearly what's going
on under your browser's hood with
lightbeam once installed the app will
track which websites are talking to your
browser even the third-party sites
serving up things like ad banners and
tracking cookies to follow you around
the web now this is the part of the
internet you can't usually see and it
makes for enlightening observation you
can explore the information using one of
three data visualization tools data is
collected continuously as you surf
around the web building up a picture of
how your activity is being tracked and
traced
